column3: Latest; Kompong Thom: An elderly and child monk were attacked by a drunken manat 12 o’clock on January 28th in (Wat Boeung Kaek)
column6: Prasat district. Kampong Thom province. The suspect was arrested.------According to the report
column7: the violence was caused by a 39-year-old named Chong Kha
column8: who lives in the village. Suspected of being an alcoholic
column9: he often gets into arguments and attacks others without cause.------Apparently
column14: pulled up a bunch of sticks and hit two monks; Kok Lee
column15: 73 Years Old and Son Neang Sok Met 10.------KOHSANTEPHEAP
